trans-unit.source: The WS-Addressing version associated with a SOAP message or understood by an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: La versione di WS-Addressing associata a un messaggio SOAP o compresa da un endpoint.

trans-unit.source: There are currently two version of WS-Addressing: WS-Addressing August 2004 and WS-Addressing 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Esistono attualmente due versioni di WS-Addressing: WS-Addressing di agosto 2004 e WS-Addressing 1.0.

trans-unit.source: These versions can be retrieved using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.WSAddressingAugust2004%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.WSAddressing10%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: È possibile recuperare queste versioni utilizzando rispettivamente le proprietà <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.WSAddressingAugust2004%2A> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.WSAddressing10%2A>.

trans-unit.source: There is also an addressing version available that is not associated with WS-Addressing, which is retrieved using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.None%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esiste anche una versione di indirizzamento che non è associata a WS-Addressing, recuperata utilizzando la proprietà <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion.None%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This value indicates that no version of WS-Addressing is used.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore indica che non è utilizzata nessuna versione di WS-Addressing.

trans-unit.source: This is primarily for transports that do not pass SOAP envelopes on the wire and therefore have no use for WS-Addressing.
trans-unit.target: Ciò interessa essenzialmente i trasporti che non passano SOAP envelope in transito e pertanto non sono utili per WS-Addressing.

trans-unit.source: The addressing version is part of the message version: specifically <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La versione Addressing è parte della versione del messaggio: in particolar modo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> fornisce il tipo restituito per la proprietà <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> also contains the SOAP envelope version in addition to the addressing version information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> contiene inoltre la versione di envelope SOAP, nonché le informazioni sulla versione di WS-Addressing.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> fornisce il tipo restituito per la proprietà <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the addressing version that is not associated with WS-Addressing version.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la versione Addressing non associata alla versione di WS-Addressing.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" /> that is not associated WS-Addressing version.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" /> non è associato alla una versione WS-Addressing.

trans-unit.source: The addressing version is part of the message version: specifically <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La versione Addressing è parte della versione del messaggio: in particolar modo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> fornisce il tipo restituito per la proprietà <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> also contains the SOAP envelope version in addition to the addressing version information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> contiene inoltre la versione di envelope SOAP, nonché le informazioni sulla versione di WS-Addressing.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> fornisce il tipo restituito per la proprietà <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current addressing version.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una rappresentazione di stringa della versione Addressing corrente.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current addressing version.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta la versione Addressing corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier for the address version associated with WS-Addressing 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un identificatore per la versione dell'indirizzo associata a WS-Addressing 1.0.

trans-unit.source: A singleton instance that identifies the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" /> that is associated with WS-Addressing 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Istanza singleton che identifica <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" /> associata a WS-Addressing 1.0.

trans-unit.source: The addressing version is part of the message version: specifically <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La versione Addressing è parte della versione del messaggio: in particolar modo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> fornisce il tipo restituito per la proprietà <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> also contains the SOAP envelope version in addition to the addressing version information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> contiene inoltre la versione di envelope SOAP, nonché le informazioni sulla versione di WS-Addressing.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> fornisce il tipo restituito per la proprietà <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of WS-Addressing that is associated with WS-Addressing August 2004.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la versione di WS-Addressing associata a WS-Addressing August 2004.

trans-unit.source: A singleton instance that identifies the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" /> that is associated with WS-Addressing August 2004.
trans-unit.target: Istanza singleton che identifica <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion" /> associata a WS-Addressing August 2004.

trans-unit.source: The addressing version is part of the message version: specifically <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La versione Addressing è parte della versione del messaggio: in particolar modo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> fornisce il tipo restituito per la proprietà <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Addressing%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> also contains the SOAP envelope version in addition to the addressing version information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> contiene inoltre la versione di envelope SOAP, nonché le informazioni sulla versione di WS-Addressing.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> provides the return type for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> fornisce il tipo restituito per la proprietà <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Envelope%2A>.
